Title: Itekoma Hits
Description: ["Otoboke Beaver's new album ", ITEKOMA HITS, ' features six new tracks, two re-recorded songs, and the contents from their ', Love Is Short, ' and ', Bakuro Book, ' EPs. To promote the album, an animated summary video was made by Naoyuki Asano.']
Related: ['Other: Jakusansei Million Arthur', 'Prequel: Kakusansei Million Arthur']
